Title: Relates to covered developers, covered employers, covered lessees or lessors, covered developers, covered leases, and covered development projects
Summary: Relates to covered developers, covered employers, covered lessees or lessors, financial assistance provided to covered developers, covered leases, and covered development projects; provides for rights of employees working under such circumstances.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to covered developers, covered employers, covered lessees or lessors, financial assistance provided to covered developers, covered leases, and covered development projects
